SELECT EPLY_ID , EPLY_NM , INFO.PHONE , INFO.BUS_DIV , DLCD.DL_CD_NM AS BUS_DIV_NM , RETIRE_YN , DLCD2.DL_CD_NM AS RETIRE_YN_NM , EPLY_DATE1 , EPLY_DATE2 , LICEN_NO , CERTI_DATE , ATT_FILE , INFO.REMARK , INFO.CORP_ID , CORP.CORP_NM AS CORP_NM
FROM BM_EPLY_INFO INFO LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DLCD ON INFO.BUS_DIV = DLCD.DL_CD
LEFT JOIN BM_CORP_INFO CORP ON INFO.CORP_ID = CORP.CORP_ID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'RETIRE_YN') DLCD2 ON INFO.RETIRE_YN = DLCD2.TXT_VAL1
EPLY_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR EPLY_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
ORDER BY EPLY_ID
